name: Gamestate De Kuip
description: Large arcade near the Feyenoord Stadium with VR, racing, and ticket games.

name: 160K Retro Video Arcade
description: Retro arcade near Central Station with classics like Pac-Man and pinball.

name: Adventure City Rotterdam
description: Indoor theme park with laser tag, climbing walls, and interactive games.

name: Lasergame Rotterdam
description: Indoor laser tag arena located in the city center, perfect for action lovers.

name: Zero Latency VR Rotterdam
description: Free-roam VR multiplayer experience with sci-fi and zombie games.

name: VR4play
description: Virtual reality arcade with multiple game types and immersive adventures.

name: Jump-010
description: Jump park and activity center with trampolines and VR challenges.

name: Dutch Pinball Museum
description: Play dozens of working pinball machines from all eras in this cool museum.

name: Game Mania Rotterdam
description: Popular game store for consoles, new titles, and pre-owned games.

name: CeX Rotterdam
description: Buy and sell used games, consoles, phones, and accessories.

name: The Game Galaxy (Zuidplein)
description: Game and collectibles store for Funko Pops, Pokémon, and more.

name: Happy Gamer
description: Local shop offering retro and modern games and accessories.

name: Tabletop Rotterdam
description: Cozy board game café with tabletop events and a geeky community.

name: POW! WOW! Gaming Lounge
description: Chill lounge with console gaming, retro stations, and multiplayer setups.

name: Blast Galaxy Arcade
description: Small arcade with modern and retro cabinets, perfect for short sessions.
